price: 54. Mpe ye nde akeli moto na litanga ya mayi, mpe apesi ye libota mpe bolongani. Mpe Nkolo wayo azali penza na bokoki.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ بَشَرٗا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبٗا وَصِهۡرٗاۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī khalaqa mina al-māi basharan fajaʿalahu nasaban waṣih'ran wakāna rabbuka qadīran
